page.title: 16THE CHESHIRE SHOW,KNUTSFORD
page.content: Knutsford's most famous attraction is probably the Cheshire Show. It is held in June, each year. People travel from all over England to this agricultural event which features qualifying classes for the horses to go to the Royal Show at Stoneleigh.As well as show jumping, there are other events such as mini-tractor racing. There are also Pony Club games, in which our two home teams compete, the Cheshire Hunt North and South. Stands are featured selling farm machinery, animal feed and accessories. Behind them ,divided into rows, are saddlery stands, a Women's Institute marquee, a flower show and band, along with various trusts and societies. There is a section with many different breeds of cattle. In all,the Cheshire Show is a well organized, interesting event, for anyone to enjoy.
